name: cast away (itch)
description:
welcome to cast away! please enjoy this big bulky fishing game,

it's VERY slow paced ~

- - cast away - -
a parallax fishing sim
(v1.0)

- mouse - look
- arrows/wasd - walk, sit/stand
- space - cast line, reel in
- click - flick line (hold to lean), hook fish
- m - mute music

all production by me

music by disasterpeace
sounds are modified stock

please don't duplicate or reproduce,
adapt with credit ~

dev log -
v1.0 - 06-23-20 - released
-- fixed negative line bug
-- added mute button
--discounted flick upgrades
--fixed non-int fish attention values
